Attention: These Terms of Use apply to the entire contents of the Website under the domain name Geonomics.com (Website). Please read these terms carefully before using the Website.

These Terms of Use are issued by Geonomics Global Games Limited, a company incorporated in England and Wales (company number 06566718) with its registered office at 175 High Holborn, London, WC1V 7AA. In these Terms of Use “Geonomics” will be used to mean Geonomics Global Games Limited and/or any of its group companies. A full list of these companies is available from Geonomics.

Note that separate Terms of Use exist for GeoLotto.co.uk.

If you need to contact Geonomics please refer to the Contact page of the Website.

1. Introduction

1.1 Certain areas of the Website are only open to you if you have been given a username and password by Geonomics.

1.2 By accessing any part of the Website, you shall be deemed to have accepted these Terms of Use in full. If you do not accept these Terms of Use in full, you must leave the Website immediately.

1.3 Geonomics may revise these Terms of Use at any time by updating this posting. You should check the Website from time to time to review the then current Terms of Use, because it is binding on you. Certain provisions of these Terms of Use may be superseded by expressly designated legal notices or terms located on particular pages at the Website.

2.1.1 no documents or related graphics on the Website are modified in any way;

2.1.2 no copyright notices or corporate logos (whether those of Geonomics or any third party) are obscured or removed from images on the Website;

2.2 Unless otherwise stated, the copyright and other intellectual property rights in all material on the Website (including without limitation photographs and graphical images) are owned by Geonomics or its licensors. For the purposes of these Terms of Use, any use of extracts from the Website other than in accordance with clause 2.1 for any purpose is prohibited. If you breach any of the terms in these Terms of Use, your permission to use the Website automatically terminates and you must immediately destroy any downloaded or printed extracts from the Website.

2.3 Subject to clause 2.1, no part of the Website may be reproduced or stored in any other website or included in any public or private electronic retrieval system or service without Geonomics's prior written permission.

2.4 Any rights not expressly granted in these terms are reserved.

3.2 Access to the Website may be suspended temporarily and without notice in the case of system failure, maintenance or repair or for reasons beyond Geonomics's control.

4.1 You must not post or transmit to or from the Website any material:

4.1.3 which constitutes or encourages conduct that would be considered a criminal offence, give rise to civil liability, or otherwise be contrary to the law of or infringe the rights of any third party, in any country in the world; or

4.1.4 which is technically harmful (including, without limitation, computer viruses, logic bombs, Trojan horses, worms, harmful components, corrupted data or other malicious software or harmful data).

4.2 You warrant that any material you post or transmit to or from the Website:

4.2.1 is not threatening, defamatory, obscene, indecent, seditious, offensive, pornographic, abusive, liable to incite racial hatred, discriminatory, menacing, scandalous, inflammatory, blasphemous, in breach of confidence, in breach of privacy or which may cause annoyance or inconvenience; or

4.2.2 is posted or transmitted with the permission of any person having rights in such material; or

4.2.3 does not constitute or encourage conduct that would be considered a criminal offence, give rise to civil liability, or otherwise be contrary to the law of or infringe the rights of any third party, in any country in the world; or

4.2.4 is not technically harmful.

4.3 You may not misuse the Website (including, without limitation, by hacking).

4.4 You must not use any automated programme to access the Website as a logged-in user. Any automated access to the Website as a logged-out user must comply with the Robots Exclusion Protocol (as amended from time to time) and must not directly cause degradation to the Website or loss of service.

4.5 Geonomics shall fully co-operate with any law enforcement authorities or court order requesting or directing Geonomics to disclose the identity or locate anyone posting any material in breach of clause 4.1 or clause 4.3.

4.6 You will be responsible for Geonomics's losses and costs resulting from your breach of clauses 4.1 to 4.4.

5.1 Links to third party websites on the Website are provided solely for your convenience. If you use these links, you leave the Website. Geonomics has not reviewed all of these third party websites and does not control and is not responsible for these websites or their content or availability. Geonomics therefore does not endorse or make any representations about them, or any material found there, or any results that may be obtained from using them. 5.2 If you would like to link to the Website, you may only do so on the basis that you link to, but do not replicate, any page of the Website, and subject to the following conditions:

5.2.1 you do not remove, distort or otherwise alter the size or appearance of any logos;

5.2.2 you do not create a frame or any other browser or border environment around the Website;

5.2.3 you do not in any way imply that Geonomics is endorsing any products or services other than its own;

6.1 The restricted area of the site is the area that is only available after signing-in with a username and password granted to you by Geonomics.

6.2 Each account for the restricted area of the site is for a single user or company only. Except as otherwise agreed in writing, Geonomics does not permit you to share your user name and password, or any content that is only available after signing in, with any person.

6.3 Responsibility for the security of any passwords issued rests with you. You must notify Geonomics immediately if you become aware that any third party knows or may know your password or if you become aware that any third party has accessed your account.
